okay for soem reason i have 18 second lag but ill follow step by step

sudo mkdir /etc/adobe
gotcha
Now, cd /etc/adobe, then gksudo gedit mms.cfg
a window popped up
In the editor, type: WindowlessDisable=true then save the file and restart firefox.

You'll notice now that some dropdown menus will drop behind other flash objects, (a slight inconvenience), but much better than all the crashing.
